page.title: 16BRANT BROUGHTON ARABLE FARM
page.content: I live at "The Clays" Brant Broughton. There are 140 acres and it is an arable farm.The crops grown are winter_wheat,potatoes,sugar beet,and onions. The wheat acreage is 74,the potatoes 26,sugar beet 25,and the onions 15.The farm has 4 tractors,a fork lift truck, 4 trailers,a plough,a corn drill,a sugar beet drill,(also used for onions),a potato planter,a harvester,a fertilizer spreader and a sprayer. Cultivation equipment includes a dutch harrow, power harrow,subsoiler, drags,Cambridge rolls and various other sets of harrows as well. We have a sugar beet harvester and onion topper and grader which is used for potatoes as well. There is an elevator and corn and onion drying equipment.
